snippet: A coalition of residents and community groups accused city officials of understating the traffic problems and other impacts the company’s move would have on their neighborhoods.
abstract: South Bronx Unite, coalition of residents and community groups that have been fighting FreshDirect's move to the Bronx files lawsuit against New York City; group accuses city officials of understating traffic and environmental problems company’s relocation would have on their neighborhoods.
lead_paragraph: A coalition of residents and community groups accused city officials of understating the traffic problems and other impacts the company’s move would have on their neighborhoods.

headline.seo: Residents Sue FreshDirect Over Move to the Bronx
headline.main: Residents Sue FreshDirect Over Move to the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Residents Sue FreshDirect Over Move To the Bronx
